下: (ka/ge/shita/shimo/moto/sa/kuda/o) - abaixo, abaixo, abaixo, abaixo, mais jovem (ex. filha); fundo; abaixo, embaixo; logo depois, logo depois
下々: (しもじも) - the lower classes; the common people
下がかる: (しもがかる) - to talk about indecent things
下がり: (さがり) - (ant: 上がり・1) fall/decline/lowering/hanging down/drooping/slanting (downward); {sumo} string apron/ornamental cords hanging from the front of a sumo wrestler's belt; (usu. as お下がり)  food offering to the gods/leftovers/hand-me-downs; leaving (one's master's place for home); a little after ...
下がり目: (さがりめ) - eyes slanting downward; decline
下がる: (さがる) - (ant: 上がる・1) to come down/to go down/to fall/to drop/to sink/to get lower; to hang/to dangle; to move back/to step back/to withdraw/to retire; to deteriorate/to fall off/to be downgraded; to get closer to the present day; (in Kyoto) to go south
下げ: (さげ) - (ant: 上げ・2) lowering/sinking/bringing down/letting down; depreciation/price fall; punch line (of a rakugo story); sword strap
下げる: (さげる) - to hang/to suspend/to wear (e.g. decoration); to lower/to reduce/to bring down; to demote/to move back/to pull back; to clear (plates)/to remove (food, etc. from table or altar)
下げわたす: (さげわたす) - to make a (government) grant; to release (a criminal)
下げ弓: (さげゆみ) - down-bow (technique used when playing a string instrument)
下げ止まり: (さげどまり) - bottoming out; reaching a floor; ceasing to fall; edging lower
下げ渋る: (さげしぶる) - to hold up; to be steady
下げ渡す: (さげわたす) - to make a (government) grant; to release (a criminal)
下げ緒: (さげお) - cord for attaching a sword scabbard tightly to the obi; sword strap; sword knot
下げ緒七術: (さげおななじゅつ) - seven techniques using a ninja sword
下げ膳: (さげぜん) - clearing up leftover food and dishes
下げ足: (さげあし) - (ant: 上げ足・あげあし・2) downward trend
下げ髪: (さげがみ) - pigtail; ponytail; hair (hanging down the back)
下ごしらえ: (したごしらえ) - preliminary arrangements; preparation; spadework; pre-cooking
下さい: (kudasai) - por favor, me dê; por favor, faça por mim
下さる: (くださる) - to give/to confer/to bestow; to kindly do for one/to oblige/to favour/to favor
下し大根: (おろしだいこん) - grated radish; grated daikon
下す: (おろす) - to take down (e.g. flag)/to launch (e.g. boat)/to drop/to lower (e.g. ladder)/to let (a person) off/to unload/to discharge; to drop off (a passenger from a vehicle)/to let (a person) off; to withdraw money from an account; to wear (clothing) for the first time; to fillet (e.g. a fish)

下っ腹: (したっぱら) - abdomen; stomach; under parts

下に見る: (したにみる) - to look down on; to despise; to condescend

下の名前: (したのなまえ) - first name; given name
